name: 陳昶瑞
objective: 本課程主要在論述土地使用管制機制、課題與對策，以為規劃人員或設計者如何以土地使用策略系統來管制實質環境影響及與建築的關係媒介。其內容包括： 一、前言：全球化與歷史性的觀點 二、都市化、聚落形態與中心 三、反都市化及地方自治化 四、都市形態與結構，聚落機能形態 五、聚落發展過程之理論與實務觀點 六、土地使用要素及土地使用者：關聯與衝突 七、住宅、工業、商業發展與交通運輸 八、現代都市改變的壓力與永續發展。
schedule:
Week 01: Course Introduction
Week 02: Fundamentals of Land Use Planning
Week 03: The Evolution of Cities and the Role of Transportation
Week 04: Factors Affecting the Link between Land Use and Transportation
Week 05: Transportation Forecasting and Traffic Flow for Design
Week 06: Trip Generation / Distribution at the Site Level
Week 07: Classification of Streets
Week 08: Basics of Street Networks and Design I
Week 09: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Basics of Street Networks and Design II
Week 11: Impacts of Street Network Types and Design
Week 12: Elements of Land Use Planning
Week 13: Traffic Flow, Volume and Capacity in Land Use Planning
Week 14: Vertical Alignment Design
Week 15: Roundabouts
Week 16: Mode Choice and Route Choice
Week 17: Public Facilities, Parking, and Spaces
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
40% - Midterm and Final Exams
30% - Assigned Readings/Assignments
20% - Semester Project
10% - Attendance
materials: Cullingworth, J. B. and Caves, R. (2013). Planning in the USA: Policies, Issues, and Processes, 4th Edition, Routledge.
